  • Method Details

    • getAllComponents

      List<ComponentInfo> getAllComponents()
      Returns components running in the cluster.

    • requestTransferToThisServer

      boolean requestTransferToThisServer(ComponentInfo component)
      Requests the given component transfer to this server. The transfer itself is asynchronous process. Use getAllComponents(), ComponentInfo.getServerId() to get a current component owner.
      Parameters:
      component - transferred component
      Returns:
      the transfer is requested, which does not mean the transfer completed.

    • isAllowedToStartOnThisServer

      boolean isAllowedToStartOnThisServer(ComponentInfo component)
      Returns true if the component is allowed to start on the current server.
      Parameters:
      component - checked component
      Returns:
      component is allowed to start.

    • getTransferInfo

      LoadBalancingContext.TransferInfo getTransferInfo(ComponentInfo component, TimeUnit timeUnit, long timeout)
      Returns the component transfer info, or null if the component is not transferring.
      Parameters:
      component - component
      timeUnit - timeout granularity type
      timeout - transfer timeout
      Returns:
      transfer status

    • scheduleComponentAvailabilityCheck

      void scheduleComponentAvailabilityCheck(long delay, TimeUnit unit)
      Schedules component availability check. If a component is available for start BackgroundTaskLoadBalancingPlugin.selectMessageDestinationsToStartNow(java.util.List<gw.api.system.cluster.ComponentInfo>, gw.api.system.cluster.LoadBalancingContext) or BackgroundTaskLoadBalancingPlugin.selectStartablePluginsToStartNow(java.util.List<gw.api.system.cluster.ComponentInfo>, gw.api.system.cluster.LoadBalancingContext) will be called.
      Parameters:
      delay - the time from now to delay the check
      unit - the time unit of the delay parameter
